# <a name="create-an-email-signature-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="7f57c-102">Kreiraj potpis za e-poštu u programu Outlook na Webu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7f57c-102">Create an email signature in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="7f57c-103">pođi do</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7f57c-103">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="7f57c-104">**Postavke** > **sve Outlook postavke prikaza** > **sastavite i odgovor**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7f57c-104">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Compose and reply**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="7f57c-105">Ispod **potpisa e-pošte**, upišite svoj potpis i koristite dostupne opcije oblikovanja da biste promenili njegov izgled.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7f57c-105">Under **Email signature**, type your signature and use the available formatting options to change its appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7f57c-106">*Napomena:* Imate samo jedan potpis po nalogu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7f57c-106">*Note:* You can have only one signature per account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7f57c-107">Da biste saznali više, pogledajte [Kreiranje i dodajte potpis za e-poštu u programu Outlook na Webu](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7f57c-107">To learn more, see [Create and add an email signature in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span></span>
